item.title: Sample blog post to learn markdown tips
item.description: There's lots to learn! - This is a demo post to show you how to write blog posts with markdown. I strongly encourage you to take 5 minutes to learn how to write in markdown - itâ€™ll teach you how to transform regular text into bold/italics/tables/etc.I also encourage you to look at the code that created this post to learn some more advanced tips about...

item.title: Flake it till you make it
item.description: Excerpt from Soulshaping by Jeff Brown - Under what circumstances should we step off a path? When is it essential that we finish what we start? If I bought a bag of peanuts and had an allergic reaction, no one would fault me if I threw it out. If I ended a relationship with a woman who hit me, no one would say that I had a...

item.title: Camino Frances | Oct and Nov 2018
item.description:
Walking the Camino - Adventure #2. Walk from St. Jean Pied de Port in France to Santiago de Compostella in Spain.
I documented the trip on Strava.
Santiago Camino D31
The truth is that no one else can definitively know the path we are here to walk.
